attributes.action: Reduce next year's fees for all international students due to online teaching
attributes.additional_details: We are not able to approach all the university's facilities and resources needed because of online teaching and COVID-19, even though we will be going to pay a massive amount of money next year. We hope that the government should take action on this matter to support us, thank you.
attributes.background: We request the government to reduce tuition fees for all international students

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for the fees universities set for international students. This is up to individual universities.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
